wikipedia_page.main: Peter Amey (born 3 August 1935) is a British wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle welterweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics.He also represented England and won a bronze medal in -68 kg welterweight, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. Eight years later he participated in the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland.
